value.title: StarCraft 2: Has' AMAZING Eco Cheese vs ByuN! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of StarCraft 2 between Has (Protoss) and ByuN (Terran). In this series Has decides to do Has things, as he focuses on an insane Protoss economy, going toe to toe versus ByuN in macro games. I guess we can call this economy cheese? value.title: StarCraft 2: GAME OF THE YEAR! (So Far)
value.excerpt: Goblin versus Krystianer in an epic game of professional StarCraft 2. It's a bit early to call it the best game of SC2 of this year already, but it surely is the best so far. In this Protoss versus Protoss neither player ever manages to secure a solid economy so an intense micro battle is the only option.
